CompetitionExecution

Class Localization

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompetitionExecution.Localization

  • public class Localization
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Localization.LocalizationType
      ultrasonic sensor localization specific variables

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Localization(Odometer odo, SampleProvider usSensor, float[] usData, SampleProvider colorSensor, float[] colorData, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor, Navigation navigator)
      constructor for Localizer that can do both light and ultrasonic sensor parts of localization, each having its own associated methods

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getFilteredData() 
      void localize()
      determine where the theta=0 is for robot placed anywhere within the starting square by checking the angles the robot much turn for the US sensor to be within the threshold distance from each of the walls
      void zeroRobot()
      determine where the zero-zero point on the floor grid is by getting angles between the first and third and second and fourth grid lines the light sensor detects and moves robot to this location to manually set odometer to 0-0-0.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Localization

        public Localization(Odometer odo,
            SampleProvider usSensor,
            float[] usData,
            SampleProvider colorSensor,
            float[] colorData,
            EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
            EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor,
            Navigation navigator)
        constructor for Localizer that can do both light and ultrasonic sensor parts of localization, each having its own associated methods
        Parameters:
        odo - same odometer to be used for determining position in localize() and zeroRobot() methods
        usSensor - used to localize robot in falling edge style
        usData - used to hold data from us sensor
        colorSensor - used to zero robot on line intersection using light sensor
        colorData - used to hold data from light sensor
        leftMotor - left motor used to physically move robot
        rightMotor - right motor used to physically move robot
        navigator - same navigator to be used for moving robot in localize() and zeroRobot() methods

    • Method Detail

      • localize

        public void localize()
        determine where the theta=0 is for robot placed anywhere within the starting square by checking the angles the robot much turn for the US sensor to be within the threshold distance from each of the walls

      • getFilteredData

        public float getFilteredData()

      • zeroRobot

        public void zeroRobot()
        determine where the zero-zero point on the floor grid is by getting angles between the first and third and second and fourth grid lines the light sensor detects and moves robot to this location to manually set odometer to 0-0-0.
